item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】WAV - Dua Lipa - Future Nostalgia (8D Trummersive Audio) 16bits 44.1kHz Immersive Stereo
item.description:
I'm presenting this Dua Lipa's album with immersive stereo audio technology, it is not Dolby Atmos, it is not 360RA or DTS:X, I made it myself because since I have tried Dolby Atmos I don't feel that immersive feeling and no, I am not listening to Dolby Atmos incorrectly, I have compatible headphones and the streaming service but I am not convinced, so I decided to make a format called "Trummersive" (True Immersive) that shows the sounds with precision and I am sure you will like it. I'm not looking to compete with Dolby or Sony or other surround audio technologies, I'm just giving my point of view and a solution for those who don't feel involved in the sound either. You just need a headset and a device, nothing more. Sounds can come from any direction, so pay attention ;).
